definitions.definition: When a bird, insect, or aircraft flies, it moves through the air:
examples: The poor bird couldn't fly because it had a broken wing.

definitions.definition: to travel by aircraft, or to go somewhere or cross something in an aircraft:
to use a particular company to travel by aircraft:
examples: I usually fly Lufthansa/Japan Airlines/El Al.

definitions.definition: to transport people or goods by aircraft:
examples: The restaurant flies its fish in daily from Scotland.
I learned to fly when I was in Australia.

definitions.definition: a small insect with two wings
